name: Poker Show VR
description: Poker Show VR is an entertaining VR poker game featuring classic five card draw poker meets real-life fashion models as opponents, who tastefully remove clothing when they lose.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960 / AMD 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
